JOB DESCRIPTION: Software Developers with strong C programming + Networking domain expertise.   Technology to work   PON (Passive Optical Network)   A passive optical network is a telecommunications technology used to provide fibre to the end consumer, both domestic and commercial.   Skills    C   Data structures( it can be Single linked list or Double linked list)   Binary tree & Binary search   RTOS   Linux internals   Linux device drivers   Networking LAN/ WAN/ ISDN/ firewall/ VPN/ TCP-Ip   Protocols Such as BGP,OSPF ,DHCP,DNS,SMTP ,WINS, POP3 ,SNMP and Networking Products Such as Ethernet Hubs and Switches ,IP Routers and Firewalls ,Analog Modems ,ISDN equipment and Services ,IPL/ATM/MPLS Circuits
